member.name: T:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList
member.summary: Provides the base class for types that define a list of items used to create a DesignerActionPanel.

member.name: M:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.#ctor(Ascend.Windows.Forms.GradientCaption)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GradientCaptionActionList class.
member.param: A GradientCaption component.

member.name: M:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.GetSortedActionItems
member.summary: Returns the collection of DesignerActionItem objects contained in the list.
member.returns: A DesignerActionItem array that contains the items in this list.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.AntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies if the control is anti-aliased when drawn.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.Dock
member.summary: Specifies the position and manner in which a control is docked.

remarks.para: When a control is docked to an edge of its container, it is always positioned flush against that edge when the container is resized. If more than one control is docked to an edge, the controls appear side by side according to their z-order; controls higher in the z-order are positioned farther from the container's edge.

If Left, Right, Top, or Bottom is selected, the specified and opposite edges of the control are resized to the size of the containing control's corresponding edges. If Fill is selected, all four sides of the control are resized to match the containing control's edges.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.Font
member.summary: The font associated with the control.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientCaptionActionList.GradientHighColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient high (lighter) color for the control.

value.para: System.Drawing.Color . A Color that represents the gradient high color of the control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient low (darker) color for the control.

value.para: System.Drawing.Color . A Color that represents the gradient low color of the control.

member.summary: The text associated with the control.

member.name: T:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientSplitBarDesigner
member.summary: Extends the design mode behavior of the ControlDesigner.

remarks.para: ControlDesigner provides a base class for designers of components that derive from Control. In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the ComponentDesigner class, ControlDesigner provides additional methods to support extending and altering the behavior of an associated Control at design time.
You can associate a designer with a type using a DesignerAttribute. For an overview of customizing design time behavior.

member.summary: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of properties that it exposes through a TypeDescriptor.

member.summary: Specifies the number of bumps to be drawn on the split bar.

member.name: T:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientPanelDesigner
member.summary: Extends the design mode behavior of the GradientBackground.

remarks.para: ParentControlDesigner provides a base class for designers of components that derive from ParentControlDesigner. In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the ComponentDesigner class, ParentControlDesigner provides additional methods to support extending and altering the behavior of an associated Control at design time.
You can associate a designer with a type using a DesignerAttribute. For an overview of customizing design time behavior.

remarks.para: When a control is docked to an edge of its container, it is always positioned flush against that edge when the container is resized. If more than one control is docked to an edge, the controls appear side by side according to their z-order; controls higher in the z-order are positioned farther from the container's edge.

If Left, Right, Top, or Bottom is selected, the specified and opposite edges of the control are resized to the size of the containing control's corresponding edges. If Fill is selected, all four sides of the control are resized to match the containing control's edges.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientLineActionList.GradientHighColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient high (lighter) color for the control.

value.para: System.Drawing.Color . A Color that represents the gradient high color of the control.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientLineActionList.GradientLowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the gradient low (darker) color for the control.

value.para: System.Drawing.Color . A Color that represents the gradient low color of the control.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientLineActionList.GradientMode
member.summary: Specifies the direction of a linear gradient.

value.para: System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode . Specifies the direction of a linear gradient.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientLineActionList.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the control.

member.name: P:Ascend.Windows.Forms.Design.GradientLineActionList.RenderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the painting style applied to the background in a control.
